Subskills.name: Boomage
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by big bo-om.

Subskills.name: Even Bigger Bo-oM
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of big bo-om.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Boom
Subskills.description: Unleash additional bombs traveling forward in an arc after exploding.

Subskills.name: Leg Day
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using big bo-om.

Subskills.name: Wider Armory
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of big bo-om.

Subskills.name: Double Charges
Subskills.description: Big bo-om bounces once when hitting the ground dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Pyro Enthusiast
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict fire break on hit.

Subskills.name: Swift Bo-ombing
Subskills.description: Increased projectile speed for the big bo-om.

Subskills.name: Molten Boom
Subskills.description: Unleashes multiple burning trails of fire in random directions after exploding.

Subskills.name: Burn the Arena
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: More Heat
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Rollin' Rollin' Rollin'
Subskills.description: Big bo-om rolls on the ground leaving behind a trail of burning flames.

Subskills.name: Crashboom
Subskills.description: Throw big bo-om high into the air scattering additional bombs into all directions.

Subskills.name: Scattering Boom
Subskills.description: Hitting a monster with big bo-om unleashes an explosion and causes it to ricochet towards another nearby monster with increased damage and area of effect radius.
